docs.title: WEST Standard Names Documentation
docs.text: Welcome to the WEST tokamak standard names documentation using DD version 3.42.2.

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: This documentation provides a comprehensive reference for standard names used in the WEST tokamak experiment. Standard names are organized by functional categories and include detailed descriptions, units, and mathematical formulations.

docs.title: Categories
docs.text:
The standard names are organized into the following categories:

  • Coils And Control - 9 standard names

  • Core Physics - 10 standard names

  • Equilibrium - 101 standard names

  • Fueling - 1 standard names

  • Fundamental - 2 standard names

  • Ic Heating - 18 standard names

  • Interferometry - 22 standard names

  • Magnetics - 32 standard names

  • Radiation Diagnostics - 13 standard names

  • Spectroscopy - 23 standard names

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
Navigate through the categories using the navigation menu or use the search functionality to find specific standard names. Each standard name includes:

  • Standard Name: The unique identifier
  • Description: Brief description of the quantity
  • Unit: Physical units (where applicable)
  • Documentation: Detailed explanation with mathematical formulations
  • Tags: Categorization tags
  • Status: Development status

Mathematical equations are rendered using MathJax and follow standard LaTeX syntax.

docs.title: All Standard Names Overview
docs.text:
This page provides a complete list of all standard names across all categories.

Standard Name Unit Description Category area_of_poloidal_magnetic_field_probe m^2 Effective sensing area of a single turn of poloidal field probe coil. Magnetics area_of_toroidal_magnetic_field_probe m^2 Effective sensing area of a single turn of toroidal field probe coil. Magnetics atomic_mass_number_of_isotope u Atomic mass number (A) of an isotope or element in atomic mass units. Spectroscopy brightness_from_soft_xray_detector W.m^-2.sr^-1 Specific intensity (power per unit area per unit solid angle) measured by soft X-ray detector. Radiation Diagnostics capacitance_of_ion_cyclotron_heating_antenna_matching_element F Capacitance value of impedance matching element in ion cyclotron heating system. Ic Heating central_wavelength_of_spectral_line_from_spectrometer m Central wavelength of an identified spectral line after processing. Spectroscopy cold_neutral_fraction_of_isotope - Fraction of cold neutrals relative to total neutrals for a specific isotope. Spectroscopy cold_neutral_temperature_of_isotope eV Temperature characterizing the cold neutral population for a specific isotope. Spectroscopy cross_sectional_area_of_flux_surface m^2 Poloidal cross-sectional area enclosed by flux surface. Equilibrium cross_sectional_area_of_plasma_boundary m^2 Cross-sectional area of plasma boundary in poloidal plane. Equilibrium current_amplitude_from_ion_cyclotron_heating_antenna A Amplitude of current signal measured at ion cyclotron heating antenna module. Ic Heating current_from_passive_loop A Induced current flowing in a passive axisymmetric conductor loop. Coils And Control current_from_poloidal_field_coil A Electric current flowing through a poloidal field coil (per turn). Coils And Control diamagnetic_flux Wb Diamagnetic flux measured by diamagnetic loop diagnostic. Magnetics distance_to_conductor_from_antenna_strap m Distance from antenna strap to conducting wall or conductor behind the strap. Ic Heating effective_charge - Effective plasma charge number characterizing average ion charge state. Core Physics electron_count - Total number of electrons in the plasma volume. Interferometry electron_density m^-3 Total electron number density including thermal and non-thermal populations. Core Physics electron_line_averaged_density_from_interferometer_beam m^-3 Line-averaged electron density obtained by dividing line integral by path length. Interferometry electron_line_integrated_density_from_interferometer_beam m^-2 Line-integrated electron density measured by interferometer along beam path. Interferometry electron_pressure Pa Total electron pressure including thermal and non-thermal contributions. Core Physics electron_temperature eV Electron temperature in plasma. Core Physics electron_volume_averaged_density m^-3 Volume-averaged electron density estimated from multiple interferometer chords. Interferometry elongation_of_plasma_boundary - Elongation of plasma boundary cross-section. Equilibrium equilibrium_reconstruction_weight_of_faraday_rotation_angle_constraint - Weight assigned to Faraday angle measurement in reconstruction cost function. Equilibrium equilibrium_reconstruction_weight_of_flux_loop_constraint - Weight assigned to flux loop measurement in reconstruction cost function. Equilibrium equilibrium_reconstruction_weight_of_poloidal_magnetic_field_probe_constraint - Weight assigned to poloidal field probe measurement in reconstruction cost function. Equilibrium etendue_of_soft_xray_detector m^2.sr Geometric extent (étendue) of soft X-ray detector optical system. Radiation Diagnostics f_multiplied_by_poloidal_flux_derivative_of_f T.m Radial profile of F function multiplied by derivative of F with respect to poloidal flux. Equilibrium fit_chi_squared_of_electron_temperature - Chi-squared goodness-of-fit metric for electron temperature profile fitting. Core Physics fit_reconstructed_electron_temperature eV Electron temperature value reconstructed from fitting procedure. Core Physics fit_weight_of_electron_temperature_measurement - Statistical weight assigned to measured electron temperature values in profile fitting. Core Physics flux_surface_area m^2 Radial profile of flux surface area. Equilibrium flux_surface_area_derivative_with_respect_to_poloidal_flux Wb^-1.m^2 Derivative of flux surface cross-sectional area with respect to poloidal flux. Equilibrium flux_surface_area_derivative_with_respect_to_toroidal_flux_coordinate m Derivative of flux surface cross-sectional area with respect to toroidal flux coordinate. Equilibrium flux_surface_averaged_elongation - Radial profile of flux surface averaged elongation. Equilibrium flux_surface_averaged_inverse_major_radius m^-1 Flux surface average of inverse major radius. Equilibrium flux_surface_averaged_inverse_squared_magnetic_field_strength T^-2 Flux surface average of inverse squared magnetic field strength. Equilibrium flux_surface_averaged_lower_triangularity - Radial profile of flux surface averaged lower triangularity. Equilibrium flux_surface_averaged_magnetic_field_strength T Flux surface averaged magnetic field strength (obsolescent). Equilibrium flux_surface_averaged_major_radius m Radial profile of flux surface averaged major radius. Equilibrium flux_surface_averaged_parallel_adiabatic_electron_current_density A.m^-2 Radial profile of parallel adiabatic electron current density. Equilibrium flux_surface_averaged_parallel_bootstrap_current_density A.m^-2 Flux surface averaged parallel bootstrap current density. Equilibrium flux_surface_averaged_parallel_current_density A.m^-2 Flux surface averaged parallel plasma current density. Equilibrium flux_surface_averaged_parallel_diamagnetic_current_density A.m^-2 Radial profile of parallel diamagnetic current density. Equilibrium flux_surface_averaged_parallel_ohmic_current_density A.m^-2 Radial profile of parallel Ohmic current density. Equilibrium flux_surface_averaged_squared_magnetic_field_strength T^2 Flux surface average of squared magnetic field strength. Equilibrium flux_surface_averaged_squared_toroidal_flux_coordinate_gradient_magnitude - Flux surface average of squared gradient magnitude of toroidal flux coordinate. Equilibrium flux_surface_averaged_squared_toroidal_flux_coordinate_gradient_magnitude_divided_by_squared_magnetic_field_strength T^-2 Flux surface average of squared gradient magnitude divided by squared field strength. Equilibrium flux_surface_averaged_squared_toroidal_flux_coordinate_gradient_magnitude_divided_by_squared_major_radius m^-2 Flux surface average of squared gradient magnitude divided by squared major radius. Equilibrium flux_surface_averaged_toroidal_current_density A.m^-2 Flux surface averaged toroidal plasma current density. Equilibrium flux_surface_averaged_toroidal_flux_coordinate_gradient_magnitude - Flux surface average of gradient magnitude of toroidal flux coordinate. Equilibrium flux_surface_averaged_triangularity - Radial profile of flux surface averaged triangularity. Equilibrium flux_surface_averaged_upper_triangularity - Radial profile of flux surface averaged upper triangularity. Equilibrium flux_surface_surface_area m^2 Radial profile of toroidal surface area of flux surfaces. Equilibrium flux_surface_volume m^3 Radial profile of flux surface volume. Equilibrium flux_surface_volume_derivative_with_respect_to_poloidal_flux Wb^-1.m^3 Derivative of flux surface volume with respect to poloidal flux. Equilibrium flux_surface_volume_derivative_with_respect_to_toroidal_flux_coordinate m^2 Derivative of flux surface volume with respect to toroidal flux coordinate. Equilibrium forward_power_from_ion_cyclotron_heating_antenna W Forward RF power arriving at the back of an ion cyclotron heating antenna module. Ic Heating frequency_of_ion_cyclotron_heating_antenna Hz Operating frequency of ion cyclotron heating antenna system. Ic Heating gas_flow_rate_from_gas_injection_valve Pa.m^3.s^-1 Gas flow rate measured at the exit of a gas injection valve. Fueling geometric_minor_radius m Radial profile of geometric minor radius of flux surfaces. Equilibrium hot_neutral_fraction_of_isotope - Fraction of hot neutrals relative to total neutrals for a specific isotope. Spectroscopy hot_neutral_temperature_of_isotope eV Temperature characterizing the hot neutral population for a specific isotope. Spectroscopy intensity_of_spectral_line_from_spectrometer s^-1 Uncalibrated intensity of an identified spectral line integrated over its wavelength range. Spectroscopy intensity_spectrum_from_spectrometer s^-1 Uncalibrated intensity spectrum measured by spectrometer detector. Spectroscopy internal_inductance - Internal inductance of plasma current distribution. Equilibrium length_of_poloidal_magnetic_field_probe m Length of sensing coil along sensor normal axis of poloidal field probe. Magnetics minimum_magnetic_field_strength_on_flux_surface T Minimum magnetic field strength on flux surface (obsolescent). Equilibrium minimum_safety_factor - Minimum value of safety factor. Equilibrium minor_radius_of_plasma_boundary m Minor radius of plasma boundary. Equilibrium neutral_density_ratio_of_isotope - Ratio of neutral density of an isotope to the sum of all other measured isotope neutral densities. Spectroscopy normalized_poloidal_flux_at_plasma_boundary - Normalized poloidal flux value defining plasma boundary location. Equilibrium normalized_poloidal_flux_coordinate - Normalized poloidal flux coordinate for radial position in flux coordinates. Equilibrium normalized_toroidal_beta - Normalized toroidal beta parameter. Equilibrium normalized_toroidal_flux_coordinate - Radial profile of normalized toroidal flux coordinate. Equilibrium normalized_toroidal_flux_coordinate_at_minimum_safety_factor - Normalized toroidal flux at minimum safety factor location. Equilibrium nuclear_charge_number_of_isotope e Nuclear charge number (Z) of an element in elementary charge units. Spectroscopy number_of_atoms_of_element_in_molecule - Number of atoms of a specific element present in a molecule. Spectroscopy number_of_turns_of_passive_loop - Effective number of turns in passive loop element for magnetic field calculations. Equilibrium toroidal_flux_derivative Wb Radial profile of radial derivative of toroidal flux. Equilibrium toroidal_flux_derivative_with_respect_to_poloidal_flux - Radial profile of toroidal flux derivative with respect to poloidal flux. Equilibrium triangularity_of_plasma_boundary - Triangularity of plasma boundary cross-section. docs.title: Coils And Control
docs.text:
This category contains standard names related to coils and control.

Standard Name Unit Description current_from_passive_loop A Induced current flowing in a passive axisymmetric conductor loop. current_from_poloidal_field_coil A Electric current flowing through a poloidal field coil (per turn). number_of_turns_of_passive_loop - Effective number of turns in passive loop element for magnetic field calculat... number_of_turns_of_poloidal_field_coil - Number of effective turns in a poloidal field coil element for calculating ma... position_of_poloidal_field_coil m Position vector of poloidal field coil geometric center in cylindrical coordi... radial_position_of_poloidal_field_coil m Major radius (R coordinate) of poloidal field coil geometric center in cylind... radial_width_of_poloidal_field_coil m Horizontal full width (radial extent) of poloidal field coil rectangular cros... vertical_height_of_poloidal_field_coil m Vertical full height of poloidal field coil rectangular cross-section. vertical_position_of_poloidal_field_coil m Height (Z coordinate) of poloidal field coil geometric center in cylindrical ...

docs.title: Core Physics
docs.text:
This category contains standard names related to core physics.

Standard Name Unit Description effective_charge - Effective plasma charge number characterizing average ion charge state. electron_density m^-3 Total electron number density including thermal and non-thermal populations. electron_pressure Pa Total electron pressure including thermal and non-thermal contributions. electron_temperature eV Electron temperature in plasma. fit_chi_squared_of_electron_temperature - Chi-squared goodness-of-fit metric for electron temperature profile fitting. fit_reconstructed_electron_temperature eV Electron temperature value reconstructed from fitting procedure. fit_weight_of_electron_temperature_measurement - Statistical weight assigned to measured electron temperature values in profil... thermal_electron_density m^-3 Electron number density of thermal (Maxwellian) population only. thermal_electron_pressure Pa Thermal electron pressure from random thermal motion only. volume_averaged_effective_charge_due_to_ohmic - Volume-averaged effective charge estimated from ohmic flux consumption.

docs.title: Equilibrium
docs.text:
This category contains standard names related to equilibrium.

Standard Name Unit Description cross_sectional_area_of_flux_surface m^2 Poloidal cross-sectional area enclosed by flux surface. cross_sectional_area_of_plasma_boundary m^2 Cross-sectional area of plasma boundary in poloidal plane. elongation_of_plasma_boundary - Elongation of plasma boundary cross-section. equilibrium_reconstruction_weight_of_faraday_rotation_angle_constraint - Weight assigned to Faraday angle measurement in reconstruction cost function. equilibrium_reconstruction_weight_of_flux_loop_constraint - Weight assigned to flux loop measurement in reconstruction cost function. equilibrium_reconstruction_weight_of_poloidal_magnetic_field_probe_constraint - Weight assigned to poloidal field probe measurement in reconstruction cost fu... f_multiplied_by_poloidal_flux_derivative_of_f T.m Radial profile of F function multiplied by derivative of F with respect to po... flux_surface_area m^2 Radial profile of flux surface area. flux_surface_area_derivative_with_respect_to_poloidal_flux Wb^-1.m^2 Derivative of flux surface cross-sectional area with respect to poloidal flux. flux_surface_area_derivative_with_respect_to_toroidal_flux_coordinate m Derivative of flux surface cross-sectional area with respect to toroidal flux... flux_surface_averaged_elongation - Radial profile of flux surface averaged elongation. flux_surface_averaged_inverse_major_radius m^-1 Flux surface average of inverse major radius. flux_surface_averaged_inverse_squared_magnetic_field_strength T^-2 Flux surface average of inverse squared magnetic field strength. flux_surface_averaged_lower_triangularity - Radial profile of flux surface averaged lower triangularity. flux_surface_averaged_magnetic_field_strength T Flux surface averaged magnetic field strength (obsolescent). flux_surface_averaged_major_radius m Radial profile of flux surface averaged major radius. flux_surface_averaged_parallel_adiabatic_electron_current_density A.m^-2 Radial profile of parallel adiabatic electron current density. flux_surface_averaged_parallel_bootstrap_current_density A.m^-2 Flux surface averaged parallel bootstrap current density. flux_surface_averaged_parallel_current_density A.m^-2 Flux surface averaged parallel plasma current density. flux_surface_averaged_parallel_diamagnetic_current_density A.m^-2 Radial profile of parallel diamagnetic current density. flux_surface_averaged_parallel_ohmic_current_density A.m^-2 Radial profile of parallel Ohmic current density. flux_surface_averaged_squared_magnetic_field_strength T^2 Flux surface average of squared magnetic field strength. flux_surface_averaged_squared_toroidal_flux_coordinate_gradient_magnitude - Flux surface average of squared gradient magnitude of toroidal flux coordinate. flux_surface_averaged_squared_toroidal_flux_coordinate_gradient_magnitude_divided_by_squared_magnetic_field_strength T^-2 Flux surface average of squared gradient magnitude divided by squared field s... flux_surface_averaged_squared_toroidal_flux_coordinate_gradient_magnitude_divided_by_squared_major_radius m^-2 Flux surface average of squared gradient magnitude divided by squared major r... flux_surface_averaged_toroidal_current_density A.m^-2 Flux surface averaged toroidal plasma current density. flux_surface_averaged_toroidal_flux_coordinate_gradient_magnitude - Flux surface average of gradient magnitude of toroidal flux coordinate. flux_surface_averaged_triangularity - Radial profile of flux surface averaged triangularity. flux_surface_averaged_upper_triangularity - Radial profile of flux surface averaged upper triangularity. flux_surface_surface_area m^2 Radial profile of toroidal surface area of flux surfaces. flux_surface_volume m^3 Radial profile of flux surface volume. flux_surface_volume_derivative_with_respect_to_poloidal_flux Wb^-1.m^3 Derivative of flux surface volume with respect to poloidal flux. flux_surface_volume_derivative_with_respect_to_toroidal_flux_coordinate m^2 Derivative of flux surface volume with respect to toroidal flux coordinate. geometric_minor_radius m Radial profile of geometric minor radius of flux surfaces. internal_inductance - Internal inductance of plasma current distribution. lower_elongation_of_plasma_boundary - Lower half elongation of plasma boundary. lower_triangularity_of_plasma_boundary - Lower triangularity of plasma boundary. magnetic_field_line_length_for_single_poloidal_transit m Radial profile of magnetic field line length for single poloidal transit. magnetic_shear - Radial profile of magnetic shear. maximum_magnetic_field_strength_on_flux_surface T Maximum magnetic field strength on flux surface (obsolescent). minimum_magnetic_field_strength_on_flux_surface T Minimum magnetic field strength on flux surface (obsolescent). minimum_safety_factor - Minimum value of safety factor. minor_radius_of_plasma_boundary m Minor radius of plasma boundary. normalized_poloidal_flux_at_plasma_boundary - Normalized poloidal flux value defining plasma boundary location. normalized_poloidal_flux_coordinate - Normalized poloidal flux coordinate for radial position in flux coordinates. normalized_toroidal_beta - Normalized toroidal beta parameter. normalized_toroidal_flux_coordinate - Radial profile of normalized toroidal flux coordinate. normalized_toroidal_flux_coordinate_at_minimum_safety_factor - Normalized toroidal flux at minimum safety factor location. plasma_pressure Pa Radial profile of plasma pressure. plasma_thermal_energy J Total thermal energy of confined plasma. plasma_volume m^3 Total volume enclosed by plasma boundary. poloidal_beta - Poloidal beta parameter for plasma pressure. poloidal_circumference_of_plasma_boundary m Poloidal circumference of plasma boundary at outboard midplane. poloidal_component_of_magnetic_field_at_outboard_midplane T Radial profile of poloidal magnetic field strength at outboard midplane. poloidal_flux Wb Radial profile of poloidal magnetic flux. poloidal_flux_at_magnetic_axis Wb Poloidal flux at magnetic axis location. poloidal_flux_at_plasma_boundary Wb Poloidal magnetic flux at plasma boundary surface. poloidal_flux_derivative_with_respect_to_toroidal_flux_coordinate Wb.m^-1 Radial derivative of poloidal flux with respect to toroidal flux coordinate. poloidal_magnetic_flux Wb Poloidal magnetic flux enclosed by flux surface in tokamak. poloidal_magnetic_flux_at_magnetic_axis Wb Value of poloidal magnetic flux at the magnetic axis. poloidal_magnetic_flux_at_plasma_boundary Wb Value of poloidal magnetic flux at the plasma boundary. position_of_active_limiter_point m Position vector of active limiter contact point. position_of_geometric_axis_of_plasma_boundary m Position of geometric center of plasma boundary. position_of_magnetic_axis m Position vector of magnetic axis. position_of_plasma_boundary_outline m Position vector contour defining plasma boundary shape. position_of_primary_strike_point m Position vector of primary strike point. position_of_primary_x_point m Position vector of primary X-point. radial_position_derivative_of_geometric_axis - Radial profile of radial derivative of geometric major radius. radial_position_of_active_limiter_point m Major radius of active limiter contact point. radial_position_of_geometric_axis m Radial profile of geometric major radius of flux surfaces. radial_position_of_geometric_axis_of_plasma_boundary m Major radius of geometric center of plasma boundary. radial_position_of_inboard_point_at_outboard_midplane_height m Radial coordinate of inboard flux surface point at outboard midplane height. radial_position_of_magnetic_axis m Major radius of magnetic axis location. radial_position_of_outboard_point_at_midplane m Radial coordinate of outboard flux surface point at midplane. radial_position_of_plasma_boundary_outline m Major radius points defining plasma boundary contour. radial_position_of_primary_strike_point m Major radius of primary strike point location. radial_position_of_primary_x_point m Major radius of primary X-point location. radial_shafranov_shift m Radial profile of Shafranov radial shift of flux surfaces. reference_major_radius_of_vacuum_toroidal_magnetic_field m Reference major radius where vacuum toroidal magnetic field is specified. safety_factor - Radial profile of safety factor. safety_factor_at_95_percent_flux_surface - Safety factor at 95% normalized flux surface. safety_factor_at_magnetic_axis - Safety factor at magnetic axis. surface_area_of_plasma_boundary m^2 Surface area of toroidal plasma boundary. toroidal_beta - Toroidal beta parameter for plasma pressure. toroidal_component_of_magnetic_field_at_magnetic_axis T Toroidal magnetic field component at magnetic axis. toroidal_flux Wb Radial profile of toroidal magnetic flux. toroidal_flux_coordinate m Radial profile of toroidal flux coordinate. toroidal_flux_derivative Wb Radial profile of radial derivative of toroidal flux. toroidal_flux_derivative_with_respect_to_poloidal_flux - Radial profile of toroidal flux derivative with respect to poloidal flux. trapped_particle_fraction - Radial profile of trapped particle fraction. triangularity_of_plasma_boundary - Triangularity of plasma boundary cross-section. upper_elongation_of_plasma_boundary - Upper half elongation of plasma boundary. upper_triangularity_of_plasma_boundary - Upper triangularity of plasma boundary. vacuum_toroidal_magnetic_field_at_reference_major_radius T Vacuum toroidal magnetic field magnitude at reference major radius. vertical_position_of_active_limiter_point m Height of active limiter contact point. vertical_position_of_geometric_axis_of_plasma_boundary m Height of geometric center of plasma boundary. vertical_position_of_magnetic_axis m Height of magnetic axis location. vertical_position_of_plasma_boundary_outline m Height coordinates defining plasma boundary contour. vertical_position_of_primary_strike_point m Height of primary strike point location. vertical_position_of_primary_x_point m Height of primary X-point location. volume_enclosed_by_flux_surface m^3 Volume enclosed inside a toroidal magnetic flux surface.

docs.title: Fueling
docs.text:
This category contains standard names related to fueling.

Standard Name Unit Description gas_flow_rate_from_gas_injection_valve Pa.m^3.s^-1 Gas flow rate measured at the exit of a gas injection valve.

docs.title: Fundamental
docs.text:
This category contains standard names related to fundamental.

Standard Name Unit Description plasma_current A Total toroidal plasma current. time s Time coordinate for time-dependent measurements.

docs.title: Ic Heating
docs.text:
This category contains standard names related to ic heating.

Standard Name Unit Description capacitance_of_ion_cyclotron_heating_antenna_matching_element F Capacitance value of impedance matching element in ion cyclotron heating system. current_amplitude_from_ion_cyclotron_heating_antenna A Amplitude of current signal measured at ion cyclotron heating antenna module. distance_to_conductor_from_antenna_strap m Distance from antenna strap to conducting wall or conductor behind the strap. forward_power_from_ion_cyclotron_heating_antenna W Forward RF power arriving at the back of an ion cyclotron heating antenna mod... frequency_of_ion_cyclotron_heating_antenna Hz Operating frequency of ion cyclotron heating antenna system. phase_of_current_from_antenna_strap rad Phase angle of current flowing through individual antenna strap. phase_of_forward_power_from_ion_cyclotron_heating_antenna rad Phase angle of forward RF power relative to first module in antenna array. phase_of_reflected_power_from_ion_cyclotron_heating_antenna rad Phase angle of reflected RF power relative to forward power of the same module. position_of_antenna_strap_outline m Position vector defining antenna strap outline geometry in cylindrical coordi... power_launched_from_ion_cyclotron_heating_antenna W Total RF power launched into the vacuum vessel from ion cyclotron heating ant... pressure_amplitude_from_ion_cyclotron_heating_antenna Pa Amplitude of pressure measurement at ion cyclotron heating antenna module. radial_position_of_antenna_strap_outline m Major radius (R coordinate) of antenna strap outline points in cylindrical co... reflected_power_from_ion_cyclotron_heating_antenna W Reflected RF power from an ion cyclotron heating antenna module. toroidal_angle_of_antenna_strap_outline rad Toroidal angle (φ coordinate) of antenna strap outline points in cylindrical ... toroidal_width_of_antenna_strap m Width of antenna strap in the toroidal direction. vertical_position_of_antenna_strap_outline m Height (Z coordinate) of antenna strap outline points in cylindrical coordina... voltage_amplitude_from_ion_cyclotron_heating_antenna V Amplitude of voltage signal measured at ion cyclotron heating antenna module. voltage_phase_from_ion_cyclotron_heating_antenna rad Phase angle of voltage signal measured at ion cyclotron heating antenna module.

docs.title: Interferometry
docs.text:
This category contains standard names related to interferometry.

Standard Name Unit Description electron_count - Total number of electrons in the plasma volume. electron_line_averaged_density_from_interferometer_beam m^-3 Line-averaged electron density obtained by dividing line integral by path len... electron_line_integrated_density_from_interferometer_beam m^-2 Line-integrated electron density measured by interferometer along beam path. electron_volume_averaged_density m^-3 Volume-averaged electron density estimated from multiple interferometer chords. measured_faraday_rotation_angle rad Measured Faraday rotation angle used in equilibrium reconstruction. path_length_variation_from_interferometer_beam m Optical path length variation due to plasma refractive index changes. phase_from_interferometer_beam rad Phase shift measured by interferometer, corrected for fringe jumps. phase_to_electron_line_integrated_density_conversion_factor_of_interferometer_beam m^-2.rad^-1 Conversion factor from measured phase to line-integrated electron density. position_of_first_point_of_interferometer_beam m Position vector of the first point defining interferometer line of sight. position_of_second_point_of_interferometer_beam m Position vector of the second point defining interferometer line of sight. position_of_third_point_of_interferometer_beam m Position vector of the third point defining reflected interferometer line of ... radial_position_of_first_point_of_interferometer_beam m Major radius of the first point defining interferometer line of sight. radial_position_of_second_point_of_interferometer_beam m Major radius of the second point defining interferometer line of sight. radial_position_of_third_point_of_interferometer_beam m Major radius of the third point defining reflected interferometer line of sight. reconstructed_faraday_rotation_angle rad Reconstructed Faraday angle from equilibrium solution along diagnostic chord. toroidal_angle_of_first_point_of_interferometer_beam rad Toroidal angle of the first point defining interferometer line of sight. toroidal_angle_of_second_point_of_interferometer_beam rad Toroidal angle of the second point defining interferometer line of sight. toroidal_angle_of_third_point_of_interferometer_beam rad Toroidal angle of the third point defining reflected interferometer line of s... vertical_position_of_first_point_of_interferometer_beam m Height (Z coordinate) of the first point defining interferometer line of sight. vertical_position_of_second_point_of_interferometer_beam m Height (Z coordinate) of the second point defining interferometer line of sight. vertical_position_of_third_point_of_interferometer_beam m Height (Z coordinate) of the third point defining reflected interferometer li... wavelength_of_interferometer_beam m Wavelength of laser light used for interferometry measurement.

docs.title: Magnetics
docs.text:
This category contains standard names related to magnetics.

Standard Name Unit Description area_of_poloidal_magnetic_field_probe m^2 Effective sensing area of a single turn of poloidal field probe coil. area_of_toroidal_magnetic_field_probe m^2 Effective sensing area of a single turn of toroidal field probe coil. diamagnetic_flux Wb Diamagnetic flux measured by diamagnetic loop diagnostic. length_of_poloidal_magnetic_field_probe m Length of sensing coil along sensor normal axis of poloidal field probe. length_of_toroidal_magnetic_field_probe m Length of sensing coil along sensor normal axis of toroidal field probe. magnetic_field_from_poloidal_magnetic_field_probe T Magnetic field component measured by poloidal field probe along sensor normal... magnetic_field_from_toroidal_magnetic_field_probe T Magnetic field component measured by toroidal field probe along sensor normal... measured_poloidal_component_of_magnetic_field_from_poloidal_magnetic_field_probe T Measured poloidal magnetic field from probe used in equilibrium reconstruction. measured_poloidal_magnetic_flux_from_flux_loop Wb Measured poloidal magnetic flux from flux loop used in reconstruction. number_of_turns_of_poloidal_magnetic_field_probe - Number of turns in the sensing coil of poloidal field probe. number_of_turns_of_toroidal_magnetic_field_probe - Number of turns in the sensing coil of toroidal field probe. poloidal_angle_of_sensor_normal_of_poloidal_magnetic_field_probe rad Poloidal angle of sensor normal axis orientation of poloidal field probe. poloidal_angle_of_sensor_normal_of_toroidal_magnetic_field_probe rad Poloidal angle of sensor normal axis orientation of toroidal field probe. poloidal_magnetic_flux_from_flux_loop Wb Poloidal magnetic flux measured by flux loop diagnostic. position_of_flux_loop m Position vector of flux loop contour point in cylindrical coordinates. position_of_poloidal_magnetic_field_probe m Position vector of poloidal field probe center in cylindrical coordinates. position_of_toroidal_magnetic_field_probe m Position vector of toroidal field probe center in cylindrical coordinates. radial_position_of_flux_loop m Major radius (R coordinate) of flux loop contour point in cylindrical coordin... radial_position_of_poloidal_magnetic_field_probe m Major radius (R coordinate) of poloidal field probe center in cylindrical coo... radial_position_of_toroidal_magnetic_field_probe m Major radius (R coordinate) of toroidal field probe center in cylindrical coo... reconstructed_poloidal_component_of_magnetic_field_from_poloidal_magnetic_field_probe T Reconstructed poloidal field from equilibrium solution at probe location. reconstructed_poloidal_magnetic_flux_from_flux_loop Wb Reconstructed poloidal flux from equilibrium solution through flux loop. reference_radial_position_of_vacuum_toroidal_magnetic_field m Reference major radius where vacuum toroidal magnetic field is specified. toroidal_angle_of_poloidal_magnetic_field_probe rad Toroidal angle (φ coordinate) of poloidal field probe center in cylindrical c... toroidal_angle_of_sensor_normal_of_poloidal_magnetic_field_probe rad Toroidal angle of sensor normal axis projection of poloidal field probe. toroidal_angle_of_sensor_normal_of_toroidal_magnetic_field_probe rad Toroidal angle of sensor normal axis projection of toroidal field probe. toroidal_angle_of_toroidal_magnetic_field_probe rad Toroidal angle (φ coordinate) of toroidal field probe center in cylindrical c... toroidal_component_of_vacuum_magnetic_field_at_reference_position T Vacuum toroidal magnetic field component at reference position. vertical_position_of_flux_loop m Height (Z coordinate) of flux loop contour point in cylindrical coordinates. vertical_position_of_poloidal_magnetic_field_probe m Height (Z coordinate) of poloidal field probe center in cylindrical coordinates. vertical_position_of_toroidal_magnetic_field_probe m Height (Z coordinate) of toroidal field probe center in cylindrical coordinates. voltage_from_poloidal_magnetic_field_probe V Voltage induced across terminals of poloidal field probe coil.

docs.title: Radiation Diagnostics
docs.text:
This category contains standard names related to radiation diagnostics.

Standard Name Unit Description brightness_from_soft_xray_detector W.m^-2.sr^-1 Specific intensity (power per unit area per unit solid angle) measured by sof... etendue_of_soft_xray_detector m^2.sr Geometric extent (étendue) of soft X-ray detector optical system. lower_bound_of_soft_xray_detector_energy_band eV Lower energy threshold of soft X-ray detector sensitive energy band. position_of_soft_xray_detector_line_of_sight_first_point m Three-dimensional position vector of first point defining soft X-ray detector... position_of_soft_xray_detector_line_of_sight_second_point m Three-dimensional position vector of second point defining soft X-ray detecto... power_from_soft_xray_detector W Total radiant power received by soft X-ray detector. radial_position_of_soft_xray_detector_line_of_sight_first_point m Major radius (R coordinate) of first point defining soft X-ray detector line ... radial_position_of_soft_xray_detector_line_of_sight_second_point m Major radius (R coordinate) of second point defining soft X-ray detector line... toroidal_angle_of_soft_xray_detector_line_of_sight_first_point rad Toroidal angle (φ coordinate) of first point defining soft X-ray detector lin... toroidal_angle_of_soft_xray_detector_line_of_sight_second_point rad Toroidal angle (φ coordinate) of second point defining soft X-ray detector li... upper_bound_of_soft_xray_detector_energy_band eV Upper energy threshold of soft X-ray detector sensitive energy band. vertical_position_of_soft_xray_detector_line_of_sight_first_point m Height (Z coordinate) of first point defining soft X-ray detector line of sight. vertical_position_of_soft_xray_detector_line_of_sight_second_point m Height (Z coordinate) of second point defining soft X-ray detector line of si...

docs.title: Spectroscopy
docs.text:
This category contains standard names related to spectroscopy.

Standard Name Unit Description atomic_mass_number_of_isotope u Atomic mass number (A) of an isotope or element in atomic mass units. central_wavelength_of_spectral_line_from_spectrometer m Central wavelength of an identified spectral line after processing. cold_neutral_fraction_of_isotope - Fraction of cold neutrals relative to total neutrals for a specific isotope. cold_neutral_temperature_of_isotope eV Temperature characterizing the cold neutral population for a specific isotope. hot_neutral_fraction_of_isotope - Fraction of hot neutrals relative to total neutrals for a specific isotope. hot_neutral_temperature_of_isotope eV Temperature characterizing the hot neutral population for a specific isotope. intensity_of_spectral_line_from_spectrometer s^-1 Uncalibrated intensity of an identified spectral line integrated over its wav... intensity_spectrum_from_spectrometer s^-1 Uncalibrated intensity spectrum measured by spectrometer detector. neutral_density_ratio_of_isotope - Ratio of neutral density of an isotope to the sum of all other measured isoto... nuclear_charge_number_of_isotope e Nuclear charge number (Z) of an element in elementary charge units. number_of_atoms_of_element_in_molecule - Number of atoms of a specific element present in a molecule. position_of_line_of_sight_first_point_from_spectrometer m 3D position vector of the first point defining the spectrometer line of sight. position_of_line_of_sight_second_point_from_spectrometer m 3D position vector of the second point defining the spectrometer line of sight. radial_position_of_line_of_sight_first_point_from_spectrometer m Major radius (R coordinate) of the first point defining the spectrometer line... radial_position_of_line_of_sight_second_point_from_spectrometer m Major radius (R coordinate) of the second point defining the spectrometer lin... radiance_of_spectral_line_from_spectrometer W.m^-2.sr^-1 Calibrated radiance of an identified spectral line integrated over its wavele... signal_to_noise_ratio_from_spectrometer dB Signal-to-noise ratio for spectroscopic measurements expressed in decibels. spectral_radiance_from_spectrometer W.m^-2.m^-1.sr^-1 Calibrated spectral radiance (radiance per unit wavelength) measured by spect... toroidal_angle_of_line_of_sight_first_point_from_spectrometer rad Toroidal angle (φ coordinate) of the first point defining the spectrometer li... toroidal_angle_of_line_of_sight_second_point_from_spectrometer rad Toroidal angle (φ coordinate) of the second point defining the spectrometer l... vertical_position_of_line_of_sight_first_point_from_spectrometer m Height (Z coordinate) of the first point defining the spectrometer line of si... vertical_position_of_line_of_sight_second_point_from_spectrometer m Height (Z coordinate) of the second point defining the spectrometer line of s... wavelength_from_spectrometer m Wavelength coordinate for spectroscopic measurements in the visible light range.
